Package socialnetwork.repository

Interface Repository<ID,​E extends Entity<ID>>

  • Type Parameters:
    ID - - type E must have an attribute of type ID
    E - - type of entities saved in repository
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFileRepository, InMemoryRepository, PrietenieFile, UtilizatorFile
    public interface Repository<ID,​E extends Entity<ID>>
    CRUD operations repository interface

    • Method Detail

      • findOne

        java.util.Optional<E> findOne​(ID id)
        finds specified entity by id
        Parameters:
        id - -the id of the entity to be returned id must not be null
        Returns:
        an Optional encapsulating the entity with the given id
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if id is null.

        returns all entities
        Returns:
        all entities

      • save

        java.util.Optional<E> save​(E entity)
        adds entity in repository
        Parameters:
        entity - entity must be not null
        Returns:
        an Optional - null if the entity was saved, - the entity (id already exists)
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if the entity is not valid
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given entity is null. *

      • delete

        java.util.Optional<E> delete​(ID id)
        removes the entity with the specified id
        Parameters:
        id - id must be not null
        Returns:
        an Optional - null if there is no entity with the given id, - the removed entity, otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given id is null.

      • update

        java.util.Optional<E> update​(E entity)
        updates specified entity
        Parameters:
        entity - entity must not be null
        Returns:
        an Optional - null if the entity was updated - otherwise (e.g. id does not exist) returns the entity.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given entity is null.
        ValidationException - if the entity is not valid.
